Parameters.Name: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Annex A.10: Number of existing recordings less than MexRecordings

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: Correct response. A.10: Number of recordings = MaxRecordings
Test.Description: Annex A.10: Number of existing recordings equal to MexRecordings

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: Incorrect response. A.10: Fault on DeleteRecording
Test.Description: Annex A.10: Number of existing recordings equal to MexRecordings DUT sends fault message

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: Correct response. A.10: first recording can not be deleted
Test.Description: Annex A.10: one of recordings can not be deleted

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: Fault on CreateRecordingResponse message
Test.Description: The DUT did not send valid CreateRecordingResponse message.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: No CreateRecordingResponse message
Test.Description: The DUT did not send CreateRecordingResponse message.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: No CreatePullPointSubscriptionResponse message
Test.Description: The DUT did not send CreatePullPointSubscriptionResponse message.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: No PMSPullMessagesResponse message
Test.Description: DUT did not send PMSPullMessagesResponse message

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: no notification for Video Track
Test.Description: DUT did not send notification for Video Track

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: no notification for Audio Track
Test.Description: DUT did not send notification for Audio Track

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: no notification for Metadata Track
Test.Description: DUT did not send notification for Metadata Track

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: Wrong UTC-Time
Test.Description: DUT sends message with wrong UTC-Time

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: Incorrect response: no event with Topic tns1:RecordingConfig/CreateTrack
Test.Description: DUT did not send event with Topic tns1:RecordingConfig/CreateTrack

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: no Source.SimpleItem item with Name="RecordingToken"
Test.Description: DUT sends message without Source.SimpleItem item with Name="RecordingToken"

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: Source.SimpleItem item with wrong Name
Test.Description: DUT sends message with Source.SimpleItem item with wrong Name

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: message for not existing RecordingToken
Test.Description: DUT sends message for not existing RecordingToken

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: DUT sends 3 messages

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-10 RECORDING CONTROL – CREATE TRACK EVENT (CREATE RECORDING)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: message for not existing TrackToken
Test.Description: DUT sends message for not existing TrackToken
